accesskey.description: Defines a shortcut key to focus and activate an element (typically with an aditional modifier key based on browser), value is a single character that is the shortcut key.

class.description: One or more class names defined as a class style.

contenteditable.description: Specifies wheather or not this element is editable or not.

data-*.description: Stores custom data to the webiste to this element (name, value).

dir.description: Defines text direction of the content.

draggable.description: Defines whether this element is draggable, often used for drag and drop operations.

enterkeyhint.description: Allows the appearence of the enter key to be different on mobile.

hidden.description: Defines whether this element is hidden or not.

id.description: Defines a unique identifier for the element.

inert.description: Disables element and all inner elements.

inputmode.description: Defines the input mode for the element when the keyboard is active.

lang.description: Defines the language of the content.

popover.description: Defines a popover element, it will be placed on top of the content. This element is invisible until it is called by another element witha popovertarget attribute.

spellcheck.description: Defines whether the element should have spell checking enabled or not.

style.description: Defines the style of the element.

tabindex.description: Defines the tab order of the element.

title.description: Defines the title of the element, typically shown as a tooltip hint.

translate.description: Defines whether the content should be translated or not.
